TEXT.English: Huge map of North America with random locations of Natives, resources and starting locations for Europeans.
TEXT.French: Huge map of North America with random locations of Natives, resources and starting locations for Europeans.
TEXT.German: Grosse Karte von Nord-Amerika. Die Startpositionen der Europäer und Ureinwohner sowie der Ressourcen sind zufällig gewählt.
TEXT.Italian: Huge map of North America with random locations of Natives, resources and starting locations for Europeans.
TEXT.Spanish: Huge map of North America with random locations of Natives, resources and starting locations for Europeans.

TEXT.English: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with historical locations of Natives and resources.
TEXT.French: Représentation fidèle gigantesque des Amériques (136x256 cases), avec distribution historique des indigènes et des ressources.
TEXT.German: Genaue gigantische Karte von Amerika (136x256 Plots) mit historischen Standorte der Eingeborenen und Ressourcen.
TEXT.Italian: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with historical locations of Natives and resources.
TEXT.Spanish: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with historical locations of Natives and resources.

TEXT.English: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with random locations of Natives, resources and starting locations for Europeans.
TEXT.French: Représentation fidèle gigantesque des Amériques (136x256 cases), avec distribution aléatoire des indigènes, des ressources et des points de départs pour les européens.
TEXT.German: Genaue riesigen Karte von Amerika (136x256 Plots) mit zufälligen Orten der Eingeborenen, Ressourcen und Startplätze für die Europäer.
TEXT.Italian: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with random locations for Natives, resources and starting locations
TEXT.Spanish: Faithful gigantic map of the Americas (136x256 plots) with random locations for Natives, resources and starting locations

TEXT.English: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with historical locations of Natives and ressources.
TEXT.French: Représentation fidèle immense des Amériques (68x128 cases), avec distribution historique des indigènes et des ressources.
TEXT.German: Genaue riesigen Karte von Amerika (68x128 Plots) mit historischen Standorte der Eingeborenen und Ressourcen.
TEXT.Italian: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with historical locations of Natives and ressources.
TEXT.Spanish: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with historical locations of Natives and ressources.

TEXT.English: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with random locations of Natives, ressources and starting locations for Europeans.
TEXT.French: Représentation fidèle immense des Amériques (68x128 cases), avec distribution aléatoire des indigènes, des ressources et des points de départs pour les européens.
TEXT.German: Genaue riesigen Karte von Amerika (68x128 Plots) mit zufälligen Orten der Eingeborenen, Ressourcen und Startplätze für die Europäer.
TEXT.Italian: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with random locations for Natives, ressources and starting locations
TEXT.Spanish: Faithful huge map of the Americas (68x128 plots) with random locations for Natives, ressources and starting locations

TEXT.French: Santé de la ville : %d1 %F2_Icon
[ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 par la santé de la ville
Changement de la %s1 sur la population = %d2%F3
Changement de la %s1 total = %d2%F3
%s1 de la Ville = %d2%F3
%s1 : %D2%F3 (avec Resource [LINK=%s5]%s4[\LINK])
[ICON_BULLET]%D1 [ICON_HEALTHY] à %s2_city
[ICON_BULLET]%D1 [ICON_HEALTH] dans toutes les colonies

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A settler has gained enough experience through combat to become %s1_expert[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Un colon libre a gagné suffisamment d'expérience pour devenir %s1_expert[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ein Freier Kolonist hat im Kampf genug Erfahrung gesammelt um als %s1_expert zu gelten.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A settler has gained enough experience through combat to become %s1_expert[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A settler has gained enough experience through combat to become %s1_expert[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An unfree colonist has become free for his bravery in battle.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Un combattant a gagné le droit de devenir un colon libre par sa bravoure dans la bataille.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ein Unfreier hat sich durch Mut und Einsatz im Kampf seine Freiheit verdient.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An unfree colonist has become free for his bravery in battle.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An unfree colonist has become free for his bravery in battle.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: You have discovered a ship floating in the seas! All sailors are dead. They seem to have died of thirst.
TEXT.French: Vous avez découvert un navire flottant sur les mers ! Tous les marins sont morts. Il semble par déshydratation.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt ein steuerlos treibendes Schiff im offenen Meer entdeckt! Die gesamte Besatzung ist to. Es scheint als sei sie verdurstet.
TEXT.Italian: You have discovered a ship floating in the seas! All sailors are dead. They seem to have died of thirst.
TEXT.Spanish: You have discovered a ship floating in the seas! All sailors are dead. They seem to have died of thirst.

TEXT.French: Amiral illustre : %d1_Curr/%d2_Need expérience
[SPACE](Doit fortifier pour devenir 1 %s1_ImpName)
TEXT.German: [SPACE](Muss befestigt sein, um zur Modernisierung %s1_ImpName zu werden)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_CULTURE] pour le propriétaire dans la parcelle
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_CULTURE] para el propietario de la parcela

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Influences des parcelles dans un rayon de %d1_Num
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Influye en las parcelas dentro de una distancia de %d1_Num

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut-etre bombardes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A unit must guard it to upgrade
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Une unite doit renforcer pour mettre a niveau
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine Einheit muss befestigt sein zum Wachstum

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Champ de vision %D1_Change
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Hauteur Visibilite

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot build another within a distance of %d1_Num
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Impossible de construire un autre a une distance de %d1_Num
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Mindestabstand zu anderen Geländeverbesserungen des selben Typs von %d1_Num
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Non e possibile costruire un altro ad una distanza di %d1_Num
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No se puede construir otro a una distancia de %d1_Num

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]A %s1_ImpName has revolted and joined %s2_CivDesc
